basic.description: This course introduces students to the various athletic events of Greco-Roman antiquity and the festival games in which ancient athletes competed. To explore the subject, students are exposed to a wide variety of evidence, including inscriptions, literary sources, architectural remains, vase-paintings, sculptures, and other types of archaeological finds.
basic.subject: CLA
basic.title: Sports in Antiquity: Olympians, Gladiators, and Superstars
